remarks: The objects of a subcategory are a subset of the objects of the original.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
subcss1.1 $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( Subcat ` C ) ) $.
subcss1.2 $e |- ( ph -> J Fn ( S X. S ) ) $.
subcss1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
subcss1 $p |- ( ph -> S C_ B ) $.
